variables.input:
data record( av1=$Milan,
             av2=$CapeTown,
             av3=$Mumbai,
             av4=$NVirginia,
             av5=$Dublin,
             av6=$Oslo,
             av7=$Amsterdam,
             av8=$Hangzhou
            )
| fieldsAdd overallGrade = toDouble(av1)+toDouble(av2)+toDouble(av3)+toDouble(av4)+toDouble(av5)+toDouble(av6)+toDouble(av7)+toDouble(av8)
| fieldsRemove av1,av2,av3,av4,av5,av6,av7,av8

239.title: Mumbai

241.query:
data
record(geo.location.latitude=45.4685, geo.location.longitude=9.1824, `Synthetic Site`="Milan", Availability=toDouble($Milan), Status = if (toDouble($Milan) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=-33.9221, geo.location.longitude=18.4231, `Synthetic Site`="Cape Town", Availability=toDouble($CapeTown), Status = if (toDouble($CapeTown) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=18.9582, geo.location.longitude=72.8321, `Synthetic Site`="Mumbai", Availability=toDouble($Mumbai), Status = if (toDouble($Mumbai) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=38.8051, geo.location.longitude=-77.0470, `Synthetic Site`="N. Virginia", Availability=toDouble($NVirginia), Status = if (toDouble($NVirginia) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=53.3498, geo.location.longitude=-6.2603, `Synthetic Site`="Dublin", Availability=toDouble($Dublin), Status = if (toDouble($Dublin) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=59.9122, geo.location.longitude=10.7313, `Synthetic Site`="Oslo", Availability=toDouble($Oslo), Status = if (toDouble($Oslo) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=52.3676, geo.location.longitude=4.9041, `Synthetic Site`="Amsterdam", Availability=toDouble($Amsterdam), Status = if (toDouble($Amsterdam ) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail")),
record(geo.location.latitude=30.2741, geo.location.longitude=120.1552, `Synthetic Site`="Hangzhou", Availability=toDouble($Hangzhou), Status = if (toDouble($Hangzhou) == 100, "Pass", else: "Fail"))

253.title: Milan

254.title: Cape Town

261.title: N. Virginia

262.title: Dublin

263.title: Oslo

264.title: Hangzhou

265.title: Amsterdam
